resources.string: Something unexpected happened while trying to fetch data from our server.
There seems to be a problem with the network. Please try again in a few minutes.
Oops! Your device has no network available. Please check if device is connected and try again.
We could not connect to server. Please check your network connection or try again in a few minutes
Sorry, our bad! Please contact support and tell them
%s we got an empty response from the server.
%s that server responded with a status code %d
Tell developers to take it easy on search params
